idea: We manufacture and sell professional service robots that support and assist their human co-workers in a wide array of industries. Buyers are consumer-facing companies like hospitality, healthcare, retail, senior care facilities, co living spaces, offices, airports, gated communities etc. Users of our robots are consumers and the staff that interacts/serves them. Our aim is to be at the forefront of human-robot collaboration, creating the most positive impact on human lives at work on a global level by becoming the market leader in sales, product innovation and after sales service. We aim to create and deploy cutting-edge but easy-to-deploy, easy-to-use and friendly robots working alongside human co-workers. Our robots will replace tasks, not jobs. Our first product to be delivered to the market will be an indoor delivery robot for the hotel & hospital sectors ; capable of accessing elevators and delivering food and non-food items to guests 24 * 7.
name: COBOTICCA AUTOMATION PRIVATE LIMITED
